segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I feel a little sad for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s going to get in trouble when the woman finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like she should help him instead of just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to regret climbing up there when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl doesn’t seem to care that he’s in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is one of those moments that could have been avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn’t get hurt when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me feel really down.
segments.speaker: PAR
